channel.title: Well wasent sure were to post
channel.description:
Well i wasent sure where to post this; so i'll post it here:
I was wondering if anyone knew of a server that is like the rs2 classic.
Like pking in the right spots above edgy and vorrok; and npc training; stores in right place.
Dono if anyone has made a source like that; if not maybe i should make a source like that.
Plz Post!

item.title: Well wasent sure were to post
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Justino Coder Justino
item.description:
@Coder_Justino wrote:

Try downloading a blank source, so you can add the npc’s yourself. I would download PimpScape it’s a great starter source.

Read full topic
item.source: Well wasent sure were to post
